I decided to get the iPhone 12 Pro Max after 7 years with android - I’ve had it for a few weeks now and I am loving it! 
I was up all night deciding whether or not to order it and finally ended up ordering it at 4am on a Saturday and somehow it managed to arrive just after 8am the same day - 4 hours after ordering! I thought that was really impressive. 
I’m loving everything about it so far. The camera is amazing, and it just has a very premium feel. Definitely would recommend.
My new phone is brilliant. I waited so long for it to come back into stock and I’m more than happy with it! Really nice colour too
The phone is a great product and From start to finish the transaction was so smooth and easy.

I have recently purchased this item online from Argos's website, I am indeed happy with the service and perfomance of the product and all staff.  
Thanks.

Love this iPhone. It is very slightly bigger than the XS Max (without feeling uncomfortable to hold) and the camera is noticeably better too! The screen light also feels less harsh on your eyes at any level. The back of the phone is a lovely matte pale gold colour and the edges are very shiny (although I put a cover straight on when I received it).

Thanks for costumer service

The phone is super fast and the flat sided design of the phone is super refreshing coming from apples older phones. it feels really nice in your hand and the frosted glass back helps to keep sweat and fingerprints off. however the sides are a super shiny stainless steel which collects marks and fingerprints incredibly easily. 
The screen is HUGE so it provides tonnes of space for you to be able to watch shows and allows you to have a super fast and comfortable typing experience.

It was well worth the wait, an upgrade to a iPhone 8 Plus and so glad I waited for the 12 Pro Max.
Camera is fantastic, with a huge screen and very quick processor.

The best iphone whatsoever.Had been waiting for proper upgrade for years.Its a complete package for me whether its taking pictures,shooting videos or playing games.
